title: Wide linen pants Amy / Linen palazzo pants / Wide leg linen trousers woman / Linen summer pants
description:
These pants are versatile enough to be worn in both warm and cold seasons, and they have a timeless design that will never go out of style. Pants can be updated with seasonal pieces and be worn all year round.
Wide linen pants AMY - a team of elegance and convenience serves you everywhere: at home, in the city, and during vacation. A perfect choice for the warm season, active days, and every moment you wish for an effortless, feminine look.

DETAILS
- Side seam pockets
- Wide, comfortable elastic waistband
- 100% midweight European softened (washed) linen fabric
- Oeko Tex certified linen
- Cut and sewn to order just for you in our studio
- Various colors
- Color shown in the photo is forest green
- We can add a free Color Card to your order. Leave a note, if you would like it.

SIZING
- The model is 5‚Äô6‚Äù (167cm) tall with a 84cm (33") bust, 70cm (27.6") waist, and 91cm (35.8") hips and usually wears size XS.
- The model in photos is wearing size XS - 105 cm (41,3") in forest green color.

Standard rule. For up to 172 cm tall, we recommend choosing shorter lengths (105cm / 41.3‚Ä≥) of pants as the most suitable choice. If your height is 174 cm or more, we suggest opting for longer pants that measure 110 cm / 43.3 inches.

Garment measurements were taken laid flat ‚Äì double it before comparing them to your personal measurements.

If you need a different length, please write your request in the order notes.

Note: The rise of the pants increases with each size, but the inseam remains the same.
Note: Each of our designs is being made to order, thus the measurements may differ up to 0.7" (2 cm).

Fits may vary by style or personal preferences.

CUSTOMIZATION
If You are not sure, which size to choose or if you are interested in another size - we are here to help! Let us know the measurements and we will do our best to make the product you desire.
We can make the garment longer or shorter by adding or cutting up to 10 cm (4") free of charge.

CARE
Machine wash up to 30-40¬∫C on a gentle cycle
Lay flat to dry or tumble dry low in a gentle cycle program if needed
Take the clothes out while they are still damp and air-dry.
We recommend not ironing linen clothes to maintain softness and fluff. Although, if you still want to iron your linen products, do it at a low temperature whilst it is still a little humid. It will iron better and there will not be any need to wet it while doing so. Iron it from the inside out, this way the surface of linen will be protected from gloss and decoloring.
Do not bleach

title: Boho Wildflowers Cottagecore Shirt | Gift For Her | Comfort Colors¬Æ Shirt | Whimsigoth | Plant Shirts | Floral Shirt | Gift For Women
description:
Boho Wildflowers Cottagecore Shirt | Gift For Her | Comfort Colors¬Æ Shirt | Whimsigoth | Plant Shirts | Floral Shirt | Gift For Women

* OTHER OPTION
If you like this design but would like it on a sweatshirt check out my other listing here.
https://printworkshopcompany.etsy.com/listing/1557747532/boho-cottagecore-crewneck-floral

** HOW TO ORDER
1. Check our photos for sizing and color options.
2. Select your size and color from the drop-down menus.
3. Click ‚ÄúADD TO CART‚Äù to add the shirt to your cart.
4. Click ‚ÄúPROCEED TO CHECKOUT‚Äù to purchase your shirt.

** VIP Email List
Be sure to join our VIP Email list for new product releases, special promotions, and giveaways!
https://email.everbee.io/subscribe?shopName=PrintWorkshopCompany

** PRODUCTION TIME:
1-3 days (Usually 2 days)

** SHIPPING TIME:
2-5 days (Usually 3 days)

** DETAILS:
The garment-dyed t-shirt by Comfort Colors is a customizable tee made entirely from 100% ring-spun cotton.

** SIZING :
- Please refer to size chart on the listing photos for a detailed sizing chart with measurements.
- Unisex sizing.
- If you are seeking an oversize look be sure to order 1 to 2 sizes up from your regular size.
- Since all shirts are made to order, sizing issues will not be refunded.

** CARE:
- Machine wash the item inside out in cold
water
- Tumble dry: low heat
- Do not iron directly on print
- Do not dry clean

** PRINTING METHOD:
These shirts are printed using the DTG (Direct-to-Garment) printing method, which utilizes specialized or modified inkjet technology to print on textiles and garments.

** CANCELLATION, REFUND AND EXCHANGE
- Since our items are made to order we do not accept returns or exchanges. unless the item is defected or wrongly sent.
- Please contact us if you have problems with your order. We would be very happy to solve it.
- All personalized orders will use details from the personalization box. If design changes are requested please state those changes along with any personalization.

Thanks for choosing to shop with us!

title: Organic Cotton Unisex Waffle Robe, Pure Cotton Women Bathrobe, Waffle Robe Bridesmaid, %100 Cotton Turkish Handmade Robe
description:
If you are looking for a comfortable robe which you can use daily and take wherever you want then this robe is exactly what you need. We produce our robes by our very skilled family members all done by hand. So you can even order your oversize measures. A very nice comfortable robe that you can gift for your loved ones.

All our robes are made from organic cotton %100 Handmade and it's made in Turkey from Turkish cotton fabrics.

Fast absorbent unisex bathrobe available in 4 different soft colors
very comfortable to use at home or at vacations,
Our robes have two roomy pockets.

TURKISH COTTON : 100% cotton special product, made of four layers of high quality natural turkish cotton fabric. It is extra absorbent, soft, light and durable. It does not show inside, it was produced with your comfortable use in mind. It makes you comfortable with its professional sewing quality. Clothes washing product. It was washed after sewing.

SPECIAL DESIGN AND STYLISH: After the sauna and bath session, you will feel special with its comfort, fluency and lightness. It will make you look extra stylish with its special design.

POCKET AND BELT: It is designed with two pockets so that you can put your phone and other accessories. With its belt made of its own fabric, it will envelop you safely and your hands will allow different uses in your pocket.

GIFT FOR SUSTAINABLE LIFE: A special and natural product that you can present to yourself and your loved ones. You can make the person you want to gift feel special.

Key Features:
- Unisex Graphic Tees, Unisex Hoodies, Women V-Neck Shirt, Women Tank, Youth T Shirt, Toddler T-Shirt, Baby Bodysuits
- Premium quality and soft material shirts and hooded sweatshirts
- True to size women and men top clothing
- Heat transfer vinyl printed
- Custom and personalized t shirts
- Heather colors are 52% combed and ring-spun cotton / 48% polyester
- Solid Colors are 100% combed and ring-spun cotton
- Side seamed, shoulder taping, tear-away label
- Unisex oversized shirts

Customization:
- We use lettering color white for dark color garments and black for lighter color garments. If you would like to use gold lettering instead, please write GOLD lettering please leave a note in the personalization box

Ordering Steps:
- Please, check and review all photos and choose your t-shirt size and color
- If you go with GOLD lettering color, please leave a note in the personalization box.
- Click add to cart. You can go back to add more product
- When you check out, you can add a note for any request

Shipping Instructions:
- Our processing time is 1-4 business days. We Print and ship from California

Washing Instructions:
- Please turn the tee inside out before washing
- Warm machine wash in gentle cycle
- Do not bleach
- Do not dry clean
- Do not iron over the foil

Return Policy :
- All items are made-to-order. Because of the nature of these items, unless they arrive damaged or defective, I can't accept returns.

Thank you for shopping with us!

title: Positive Encouragement T-Shirt ¬∑ Personalized Summer T-Shirt ¬∑ White Personalized T-Shirt
Frank Ocean BLONDE Hoodie, Frank Ocean Blond Album Hoodie, Inspired Blonded Hoodie, Frank Ocean NIKES,gift, unisex
description:
The unisex heavy cotton tee is the basic staple of any wardrobe. It is the foundation upon which casual fashion grows. All it needs is a personalized design to elevate things to profitability. The specially spun fibers provide a smooth surface for premium printing vividity and sharpness. No side seams mean there are no itchy interruptions under the arms. The shoulders have tape for improved durability.
.: Made with medium fabric (5.3 oz/yd¬≤ (180 g/m¬≤)) consisting of 100% cotton for year-round comfort that is sustainable and highly durable.
.: The classic fit of this shirt ensures a comfy, relaxed wear while the crew neckline adds that neat, timeless look that can blend into any occasion, casual or semi-formal.
.: The tear-away label means a scratch-free experience with no irritation or discomfort whatsoever.
.: Made using 100% US cotton that is ethically grown and harvested. Gildan is also a proud member of the US Cotton Trust Protocol ensuring ethical and sustainable means of production. This blank tee is certified by Oeko-Tex for safety and quality assurance.

title: Gray Custom T-Shirt ¬∑ Motivational Words T-Shirt ¬∑ Gift for Him
description:
Explore our collection of gray custom t-shirts for a special gift filled with words of motivation! Everyone needs some motivation and support. On our customized T-shirts, you can add your favorite motivational words and let these inspirational words become his source of motivation.

Made from high-quality fabric, this gray T-shirt is comfortable, breathable and comfortable to wear. It is not only a fashionable piece of clothing, but also a gift full of warmth and encouragement, given to you to bring positive energy to his life.

Whether it's a birthday, holiday or just everyday, our custom T-shirts are the perfect gift choice for him. Let our motivational T-shirts be your way to express your love and support, and let your partner feel your company and encouragement!
